CustomField.description: When checked, the system will track the number of active assignments related to the Item Class and auto-expire all related Items once the "Assignment Inventory" is less than or equal to the "Active Assignments".
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When checked, the system will track the number of active assignments related to the Item Class and auto-expire all related Items once the "Assignment Inventory" is less than or equal to the "Active Assignments".
CustomField.label: Enable Assignment Inventory
